{"id":565618844,"lang":"cpp","time":"8 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1633352453,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/565618844/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Multiply Strings","memory":"6.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string multiply(string s1, string s2) {\n        if(s1==\"0\" || s2==\"0\") return \"0\";\n        reverse(s1.begin(),s1.end());\n        reverse(s2.begin(),s2.end());\n        vector<int> v(s1.size()+s2.size(),0);\n        int c=0;\n        string s;\n        for(int i=0;i<s1.size();i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<s2.size();j++){\n                v[i+j]+=((s1[i]-'0')*(s2[j]-'0'));\n            }\n        }\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<v.size()-1;i++){\n            c=v[i]/10;\n            v[i]%=10;\n            v[i+1]+=c;\n        }\n        if(v.back()==0) v.pop_back();\n        reverse(v.begin(),v.end());\n        for(int i=0;i<v.size();i++){\n            s+=(char)(v[i]+'0');\n        }\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"multiply-strings"}
